Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Increases the amount of money a public retirement system retiree may earn in a position of public service to $50,000
Summary: Increases the amount of money a public retirement system retiree may earn in a position of public service in the year 2022 and thereafter to $50,000.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to increasing the retiree public earnings cap
